list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fungal growth that typically takes the form of a domed cap on a stalk, with gills on the underside of the cap.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she sautéd the mushrooms in butter

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mối quan tâm về môi trường mọc lên trong những năm 1960

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of the smoke, fire, or flames produced by an explosion) spread into the air in a shape resembling that of a mushroom.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the grenade mushroomed into red fire as it hit the hillside
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lựu đạn rơi vào lửa đỏ khi nó đâm vào sườn đồi
